spells.name: Adhesive Blood
spells.description: Attackers' weapons stick to your gluey blood.

spells.name: Aggressive Thundercloud
spells.description: Flying storm cloud deals 3d6 electricity damage.

spells.name: Air Step
spells.description: Tread unsteadily on air, with limitations.

spells.name: Blood Armor
spells.description: Your blood hardens when you are wounded, increasing your AC.

spells.name: Bullet Ward
spells.description: Adamantine bullets intercept firearm attacks.

spells.name: Buoyancy
spells.description: Targets easily float on water.

spells.name: Companion Life Link
spells.description: Sense whenever your companion is wounded and call out to it in a time of need.

spells.name: Contingent Action
spells.description: Set the condition for triggering a target's readied standard, move, or swift action.

spells.name: Crimson Confession
spells.description: Touching the marked object or area turns one's skin red.

spells.name: Euphoric Cloud
spells.description: Fog obscures vision and fascinates living creatures.

spells.name: Extreme Flexibility
spells.description: Gain a bonus to AC, on Escape Artist checks, and when grappling.

spells.name: Investigative Mind
spells.description: Roll twice and take the higher roll when using certain mental skills.

spells.name: Life Pact
spells.description: Affected creatures automatically donate hp to stabilize fallen ally.

spells.name: Mirror Hideaway
spells.description: As many as eight creatures hide in an extradimensional space.

spells.name: Molten Orb
spells.description: Molten metal splash weapon deals 2d6 fire damage plus ongoing damage.

spells.name: River Whip
spells.description: Create a whip of water that you wield as a weapon.

spells.name: Silent Table
spells.description: Give yourself privacy by muffling sound leaving the area.

spells.name: Sonic Scream
spells.description: Create a cone of damaging sound at will.

spells.name: Stone Discus
spells.description: Flying discus deals bludgeoning or slashing damage.

spells.name: Striken Heart
spells.description: Touch attack deals 3d6 damage and staggers target.

spells.name: Time Shudder
spells.description: Nearby creatures are affected by haste or slow each round.

spells.name: Twilight Haze
spells.description: Illusory fog obscures vision.

spells.name: Whip of Spiders
spells.description: Create a whip made of poisonous spiders.
